reviewText: Arrived on time, but being a Anthony Hopkins fan the movie is very good. The story has a very good point, worth watching

It is almost unbelievable: the leading character lives under a dictatorship,and is warned by everyone that while he travels in the States me must NOT write anything against the regime:the can put his family and himself at great risk...
First pearl: Hopkins makes very serious accusations againt the government, and inmediately his son is murdered....But he really does not seem to realize what has happened....
Second pearl: he looks for help all over, but of course he never thinks it might be useful to get in contact with US authorities...
Other... well that is enough. Intelligent audiences please abstain
